patthana15.57:1.1: Savitakkaṁ kusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakko nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi.
patthana15.57:2.1: Savitakkaṁ akusalaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasavitakko naakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā …. Hetuyā tīṇi …pe… avigate tīṇi. (Abyākatamūlaṁ tīṇiyeva paccayavasena.)
